item.title: What should ChatGPT call you?
item.description:
You can call me Gajendra. Iâ€™m working to become a skilled ethical hacker and bug bounty hunter, focusing on learning practical cybersecurity techniques and offensive security methods. I prefer responses that are clear, technical, and straight to the point, with real-world examples related to CTF challenges and red/blue teaming. Keep it simple, focused on Linux/Arch Linux, and give me actionable insights.

What do you do?

Iâ€™m a student of Bachelor in Information Technology with a passion for cybersecurity, focusing on red teaming, blue teaming, bug bounties, and CTF challenges. My goal is to specialize in both offensive and defensive security techniques to become a professional ethical hacker. I actively participate in CTFs on platforms like TryHackMe and HackTheBox. Additionally, Iâ€™m learning programming languages such as Bash, Python, PHP, C, HTML, and JavaScript to better understand applications from a developer’s perspective and secure them by identifying vulnerabilities before malicious actors can exploit them.
